name: Mitch the Meteor
description:
Mitch the Meteor is a top down shooter where your only bullets are pieces of yourself, used to destroy planets and their occupants. your mass - which planets and flares reduce - will determine your health and your ammo. don't shoot too much, but just enough to not get hit! Wipe out as many species as you can as the years pass.

Mitch the Meteor was made for the 2012 Global Game Jam.

(@_KPDwyer) Kyle Dwyer - Programming, Art, Design.
(@wisest_owl) Ryan Hill - Sound, Programming, Design.
(@mina88) Mina Tawadrous - Design.
(@Macktimus) Mackenzie Eaton - Design.
